verbose_text: In a preliminary study, tumor pO 2 in rhabdomyosarcomas and in 9 L-gliomas was monitored longitudinally by EPR oximetry.29 We found that a single dose of ITPP induced an increase in tumor pO 2 that was maximal at 2 hours postadministration.29 In this study, we selected this time point to evaluate the impact of ITPP treatment on tumor pO 2 and oxygen dependent MR parameters in two rat tumor models.
evidence: ITPP induced an increase in tumor pO
